blogPost.excerpt: Tappity is building the world’s largest library of interactive lessons for kids—starting with science. Find 100+ popular science topics taught by live-action characters who appear to magically interact with your kids in real time.
blogPost.body: Tappity is building the world’s largest library of interactive lessons for kids—starting with science. Find 100+ popular science topics taught by live-action characters who appear to magically interact with your kids in real time.
blogPost.title: Tappity - World's largest library of interactive lessons for kids
blogPost.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Tappity正在为孩子们建立世界上最大的互动课程图书馆-从科学开始。找到100多个由真人角色教授的科普话题，这些角色似乎能与你的孩子实时神奇地互动。
localize.tagline: 世界上最大的儿童互动课程图书馆

localize.description: Tappity正在爲孩子們建立世界上最大的互動課程圖書館-從科學開始。找到100多個由真人角色教授的科普話題，這些角色似乎能與你的孩子實時神奇地互動。
localize.tagline: 世界上最大的兒童互動課程圖書館

previous.excerpt: With Batch Styler editing multiple styles in Figma becomes way easier: Change all your color & typography styles at once, changing details like hue or font family within seconds.
previous.title: Batch Styler for Figma - Change multiple Color / Text Styles at once

localize.description: 有了Batch Styler，在Figma中编辑多种风格变得更加容易。一次性改变所有的颜色和排版风格，在几秒钟内改变色调或字体系列等细节。
localize.tagline: 一次性改变多种颜色/文字风格

localize.description: 有了Batch Styler，在Figma中編輯多種風格變得更加容易。一次性改變所有的顏色和排版風格，在幾秒鐘內改變色調或字體系列等細節。
localize.tagline: 一次性改變多種顏色/文字風格
